website_summaries.verdict: The ideal choice for those wanting a stylish garment rack to fit in with any living space.
pros: Extremely sturdy despite its lightweight design
Many owners admire the rack's stylish bamboo construction
cons: Some owners had problems with the product arriving damaged from shipping

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and stability!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a plant rack and worked perfectly. Super easy to put together, comes with all the hardware you need and the Allen wrench. Could go faster if you use a drill with an allen tip bit. Was pleasantly surprised with the stability of the shelf and quality of the materials! Looks great and highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Easy Assembly is a Bonus
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice clothing rack! I recently moved into a tiny studio apartment, and my only closet has shelves, no clothing rail. I decided to use that closet for other storage and opt for a freestanding clothing wrack instead. It was a breeze to assemble with my boyfriend's help and so far it seems sturdy (and as you can see, holds a lot of clothes). I'm also really happy with the A-frame type design because the clothing bar at the top doesn't interfere with my apartment's built-in shelf above.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for termites.
customer_reviews.text: We liked the rack but noticed a fine powder would appear on the floor beneath the rack. It turns out that one of the slats was being eaten away by termites. Our exterminator confirmed this and sprayed it with the appropriate chemicals. Our house does not have termites so we know that the rack had them when it was delivered to us. Very weird situation
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: This product came with terrible instructions and the pieces were not labeled. Once you figure it out it takes about a half hour to assemble. Quality is okay. I got a splinter from a piece of wood not being finished properly.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Baby girls clothing rack! PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Love our clothing rack in our newborns room. Everyone who saw it asked where it was from and how to get it. Great option when a closet is not available. So glad we made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline skinner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my space
customer_reviews.text: Using this neat entrance for my/my husbands shoes and jackets. Would not describe it as 'Extra Large', but measurements are accurate. It's working great - sturdy enough yet doesn't have a massive look. We can fit 5-6 pairs of adult shoes and 4-6 lightweight jackets on hangers. Longer coats would not fit above the shoes space. Would not advise sitting on the shelf area or allowing children to stand/climb.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Very handy as long as you don’t receive defective pieces
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this clothes rack and it meets the dual purpose I had in mind which is to hang laundry I don’t dry and also outfits while getting dressed. However what should have been a simple assembly became a nightmare because the top hanging bar or piece J came without a nut in one end and another of the vertical pieces came defective without screw holes. I ended up having to order a replacement which I used to swap out the defective pieces as I had no luck reaching customer service. When it is all said and done I’m happy with it but quality control needs to up their game.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea what to purchase as there are so many options and reviews not liking things and rightfully so. Hopefully this helps. This is a great piece and exactly what was described and what I expected. I am buying another!
customer_reviews.author: little island studios

customer_reviews.title: The top bar bows after six months
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this rack, I really did. Assembly was easy, and it looks great! The fatal flaw, however, is the hanging bar. With a total of 20 sweaters and shirts hanging from it, it's now visibly bowed almost half an inch. My clothes aren't that heavy, so I'm surprised to see this happen. I guess the photo is accurate: put only a few shirts up there. On the bright side, the shelves below are holding up just fine. Bummer about the bar, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this rack but one of the end pieces that screws in to the bar is stripped so I can’t tighten it, therefore it is not steady. To be fair, I have not contacted the seller yet to see if they could send me a replacement piece. Assembly was easy but the instructions were about as well written as those included in your average IKEA item. A little frustrating but I figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R. Barbaria

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. It was easy to assemble and looks rather stylish too. I needed some extra space for hanging shirts and trousers, and this did the job. There are also a couple of racks that you can store other items on. Its also perfect to use as a stand for shirts while ironing. Im very happy with this product and so far it has been very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Rex

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to assemble; great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Super-cute clothes rack at a fraction of the price of the one my daughter wanted. Came quickly and was relatively easy to put together. One piece didn't fit right, and customer service was very responsive in getting a new piece shipped out quickly. Turned out cute and my daughter loves it. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a guest room
customer_reviews.text: We converted an office to a guest room for incoming family and this little closest is so perfect! It is very sturdy and my 8 year old helped me put it together that is how easy install is. It is a beautiful color. Very sleek and modern. It was perfect for throw blankets, shoes and clothes. I HIGHLY recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Kember

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Besides the top bar sagging a bit in the middle, I’m very satisfied with this product. It looks nice, not cheap, and is a good medium size. I went with this one because of how the top bar overhangs on each side a bit for longer pieces like dresses. I am using this for a capsule wardrobe. Having narrowed down options makes choosing an outfit so much quicker/easier. I use the two shelves for shoes and sweaters (flats fit on the floor under the bottom shelf). Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Danielle Lawson

customer_reviews.title: A Very Sturdy Clothes Rack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my laundry room--to hang shirts on as I pull them from the dryer. I was pleased with how sturdy it is. It's also nice looking . I might buy another to use in a guest room that doesn't have a closet. It was a little pricey, but I see this lasting a lifetime, so I am pleased with the purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to assemble, instructions were as straight forward as they could be. Only took me about 20 minutes. I was downsizing my clothes and my previous clothing rack was too big, so I bought this one and it fits everything really well. It's so convenient because the bottom shelf fits those big white laundry baskets perfectly (not shown in photo) This is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Great free standing piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it is very low to the ground, lower thanI pictured. But it works very well for hanging shirts/ coats.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Rentz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks nice as a plant shelf
customer_reviews.text: I'm very glad I bought this bamboo garment rack for my houseplants. It was a quick and easy installation, the price is great, and the natural bamboo finish looks amazing in my home. A couple of drawbacks: 1.) some pieces had small slivers of bamboo sticking out--if I wasn't careful, I would have gotten a few splinters. 2.) A couple of the slats on the shelves are a bit loose--though I don't mind it.. Just don't put anything too heavy on the shelves!
customer_reviews.author: Mary N.

customer_reviews.title: my favorite furniture piece
customer_reviews.text: I put all the items I use on a daily basis on here. It makes finding things much easier - I do not have to go in a bunch of drawers to find things. Also, its great to just throw things on here so I don't mess up my closet. it is really sturdy - has held a large number of my clothes, even heavy pants and coats
customer_reviews.author: Michelle See

customer_reviews.title: I had a dream, I got everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. It's good quality and has a very simple look which is surprisingly hard to find. The assembly was a piece of cake. I didn't even need the instructions. Overall I really like this clothes rack
customer_reviews.author: griffin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small bedroom - chic way to hang clothing.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together (except instructions were not in English). Diagram is easy enough to follow, though. Comfortably hangs 15 hangers w/ shirts or sweaters, and then there's some space on the sides for tote bags etc. Love the storage underneath for putting folded clothes. Great for small bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Nevon K

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: As seen in the photo, this holds a good amount of clothing and storage baskets., without taking up much floor space. Perfect for this small room that does not have a closet. Very happy with that! Only downside is it absolutely takes two people to assemble~ even a third set of hands would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: TJ's mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking storage solution
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my daughter for her tiny city apartment that is short on storage. She had seen one sold by urban outfitters. This was a better value which made me happy and exactly the style and storage solution she was looking for which made her happy. Very easy install
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great in photography studio
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my photography studio. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Valvool

customer_reviews.title: Great piece in the room
customer_reviews.text: VERY EASY to assemble. looks nice and holds a lot of summer outfits {haven't used it for coats yet} The double shelves are a bonus, I use them for shoes and purses since the room doesn't have a walk in closet. Very good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Afaf

customer_reviews.title: Not an easy assembly for my particular piece.
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely disappointed in my received item. The assembly holes did not line up properly. The top bar and hardware did not even fit through far enough to screw into each other. The side posts hardware did not line up enough to easily assemble. The sturdiness is unknown because I couldn't get the top railing to come together enough to hang anything on. Bought for plants, but due to misaligned brackets and support hardware locations, I couldn’t get it assembled completely for even hanging one article of clothing.
customer_reviews.author: MessyKesstrel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for extra hanging space in the bedroom but didn't want it to look like one of those storage clothes bins. This was SO easy to put together & I like the sleek look. Best of all...I didn't actually think I would use the shelves underneath but I put a small rug on one with several pair of shoes I wear frequently & it still looks neat. I've hung my purses on the sides that stick out and they are fairly heavy so I was pleased it didn't tip over to one side. All in all, I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: susan smithhisler

customer_reviews.title: Nice clothing rack
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these and I think they are rather nice. The second one came with a defective part so I contacted Finnhomy customer service and they sent me another one. Excellent customer service, cute rack, easy assembly, great price. I would purchase this again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: rebekah murray

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it for small rooms or decor or towels clothes shoes swimsuits ect
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Very nice finish and high quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wooden finish. It is much nicer than the metal racks we have tried in the past. Very sturdy design. I had some trouble putting it together only because I didn't realize the large vertical struts are not interchangeable (left vs. right). No problem after that was sorted out.
customer_reviews.author: Tuna Piano

customer_reviews.title: I got it together pretty quickly. It's sturdy and aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: It was a little challenging to put together, but once I understood it, I got it together pretty quickly. It's sturdy and aesthetic. Holds up well to do the coats and shoes we've thrown at it. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Swayze

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I wanted it for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a little extra storage for clothes that also looked nice in my room, more an accent than a piece of furniture, and this does the trick for sure. It's cute and easy to assemble. Should you try to hang alot of heavy pieces on it? No. But do you need to pull out some seasonal pieces to have ready and not crammed in your closet with everything else? Than your like me, and this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: ekl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a guest room or for one person
customer_reviews.text: Not the strongest but it looks nice, and good for medium length clothing. Long clothing will drag on the floor. I would recommend the manufacturer make this adjustable for long dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my space
customer_reviews.text: Needed a coat/shoe rack for my entry way in my SF apt. This coat rack fit perfectly. It was easy to assemble and doesn't look cheap. It's a good size as well.
customer_reviews.author: CaliCali

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable garment rack for my guestroom, which is on small size and it fits perfectly. It is elegant and just the right size for my guests' garments/accessories. I am very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: G.Cothern

customer_reviews.title: TOP BAR MISSING PART - RENDERING USELESS
customer_reviews.text: having gone through the entire process of building this, i discover that there’s a piece missing on one of the ends of the top bar which stretches across the top that enables the screw to attach. rendering the entire thing useless and wasting and hour of my time. awesome...
customer_reviews.author: jdawuff

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one for my husband and one for myself. My husband is able to keep his entire wardrobe neat and tidy with just this. (I shamefully have a dresser in addition.) It looks lovely and minimalist in our bedroom and made a really attractive “changing area” versus just having a few bulky dressers.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great and perfect clothes rack
customer_reviews.text: Great clothes rack. Fit perfectly in my RV. Gives me so much room. Would be perfect for entry way into home or mud room. Love it. Could be a little more sturdy on the end but nothing too bad
customer_reviews.author: HealthGuru

customer_reviews.title: Great in a small room with tiny closet
customer_reviews.text: Helped me organize my small room. All my work clothes ready to go now.
customer_reviews.author: Double Zed

customer_reviews.title: That I couldn’t figure out how to get it done
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I put together right. Took apart three times and just gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne g.

customer_reviews.title: Useful item
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need for a bedroom without a closet. I use it occasionally when I visit my country house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last long. So be careful. But it looks good.
customer_reviews.text: It’s really easy to set up. And looks good. But mine came had cracked defective wood. Quality control is lacking. The crack will effect the stability in the future. I’ll contact the seller and see if I can get a replacement part. If so I’ll change the review.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Missing peg.
customer_reviews.text: This is great, but is it is missing the second peg to keep the top pole up. I currently have an allen wrench holding the pole up. Is there way I can get a replacement peg???
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Parts are more or less straight and properly cut. Doesn't look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Defective parts
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to decorate my new room with this product, but was so disappointed to find that I had received defective parts. The clothes rod would not screw in all the way, and I won’t be able to use it until I get new parts. Hoping that I’ll get new parts that aren’t defective and that I’ll be able to update this review very soon, otherwise this is a 1 star product for me because it didn’t assemble properly. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect fit in my room. I love the two shelves on the bottom and the extra ends of the poles on the top to put my sun hat. I will add a photo once I finally have it styled the way I want. It was pretty simple to put together except for one step. I would definitely recommend to use two people to put it together to make it easier but I was able to do it on my own. I would buy this again if I needed another.
customer_reviews.author: danielle isabella.

customer_reviews.title: Functional decor storage
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent extra clothing rack! Good storage, and I was able to fit quite a lot of clothes on it. A little wobbly, but not bad especially for the price. It is a nice decor piece for any room and definitely does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and functional!
customer_reviews.text: My guest room closet is filled to the hilt with my things, so I needed a spot for guests to hang up items when they visit. This does the trick and looks nice, too. My 14 year old daughter assembled it and it went very smoothly. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Special tool needed for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled, the item is super. It should come with a small tool for putting the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: ahb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I have two small houses as short term rentals, neither has a closet. I bought one and it was perfect in the small space, so I purchased a second. Easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LazyJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how nice this is given the price. It holds clothes and doesn’t wobble. It looks great it’s a way better option than the plastic clothing racks.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cute , lightweight,  easy to build
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my husband , and I loved it so much I bought it for myself. The reason for the 4 stars is because when I assembled it there was a small wood piece sticking out and I got a splinter. It was pretty bad. Had to cut it out of my skin a few days later because my finger was so swollen. Other than that I love how it looks in my room. I bought it for my clothes I use for the Season .
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The bamboo clothing rack compliments my space. I don't have a closet so purchasing an aesthetically pleasing item was very important.
customer_reviews.author: tammie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for storage or organization
customer_reviews.text: I have a big closet, but not many shelves or good storage. This item is the perfect solution. You can put it in your room for decoration, or in your closet for storage and organization. This item is great quality, and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Spiro

customer_reviews.title: Cute clothing rack
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, but in a good way. Fits a lot more than I expected. Great color! Looks great in my room. Was easy to assemble! I was able to do it on my own. Probably took me around 30 mins
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Simple, yet great!
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 25-30 to assemble this rack, it was fairly easy. I don't really have any complains, the rack is small, and the quality is good, just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: cinthya

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, great quality
customer_reviews.text: It can hold A LOT without any bending. It is very sturdy and I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ceren P

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Came in a timely manner and was very well-packaged. Nothing came broken, and the instructions were straightforward. Assembling the rack was a little time consuming, but, overall, was very easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Functional and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a narrow clothing rack that would look nice in my room but not take up too much space as my bedroom is small. It’s perfect for Hanging my favorite items that I wear most often and looks functional enough to use for plants, books or decor. A little shorter than I expected from the pictures but still fine. 1st picture accurate for size, Second picture I took from up above. Love it and have had a ton of compliments from guests
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Goss

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, looks great
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together, I’m using it for all of my coats/jackets and they all fit and it seems to handle the weight just fine. It looks great and I think it was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: It is poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: We returned this product. the shelves are flimsy and the screw holes did not line up. The top bar was bent and the screws on top bar caps (the outer pieces) were not long enough to catch the thread on the inner bar. Lastly, the pieces are not mirrored so some of the aesthetics (ex. counters-screw) does not line up like it should and is unsightly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good design but bad quality
customer_reviews.text: 50% of the screws cannot reach the designed position. Need additional tools besides the provided key. also got hurt from a small spike on the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Chen He

customer_reviews.title: Look SO cool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! I’m currently using it for more decorative purposes than practical purposes. It was easy to put together, and light enough to transport. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Helps make a room unique.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I spent a long time deciding what type of shelving unit I wanted in my room to make it unique but practical, and this one prooved to be worthy. I put a hanging plant on it with my printer and two cute, roomy, whicker baskets on the bottom. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, need 2 people to build
customer_reviews.text: Once it’s all put together it’s a great product that can hold a lot of items. However, It is nearly impossible to do on your own because of having to place/ hold pieces and put screws in. I had to call a friend to help. I would highly recommend having 2 people do it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t occupy to much space and you can hang your clothes and shoes
customer_reviews.text: I used to hang my clothes and store my shoes and it’s perfect for because it doesn’t occupy a lot of room in my small room
customer_reviews.author: Jan Carlos Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: A pretty good stand that we got a great deal on used from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MAH

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase! Looks exactly like the picture, and this adds a cute, warm touch to the space. It is a little wobbly, and the wood doesn’t align COMPLETELY seamlessly when you assemble, but for the price, it’s a really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Weak screws
customer_reviews.text: 2 screws broke in half during assembly. Both stuck in wood. Was able to remove them with pliers and replace with my own brass screws. Also, 2 of the machine screws stripped out. Left them in place and was able to finish assembly reasonably sturdy. Needs better screws and caused excessive assembly time.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I am missing the M5x42 MM screws x8... which means I can’t complete this build... how do you get in contact with someone who will send these over?!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Thongchanh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and even more beautiful than expected. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I expected. Sturdy. 5-10 min assembly with one person. So easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Love this clothing rack. Easy to put together. Simple, yet aesthetically pleasing. Perfect for any boho/vintage inspired space. Quality is good. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsy Cunanan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOY BUY
customer_reviews.text: This clothes rack is cheaply made and very difficult to construct. Do not waste your money. I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lance P. Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rack, I had one from Ikea that was cheap and wanted an upgrade. This was so worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check the height first
customer_reviews.text: Cannot hang pants by the waist, not tall enough. Would be great for kids clothes
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Chorak

customer_reviews.title: Good but lacks quality assurance
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product five stars were it not for the parts you screw into the ends of the top pole (that forms the hanger rack). I was sent a faulty wooden piece and it wouldn't screw in properly, so I ended up gluing it together that was frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy hanging closet
customer_reviews.text: used this in my entryway and love it! doesnt look cheap at all. also easy to assemble and sturdy. excellent value!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase. Very easy to assemble. One of the screws didn’t have a head so I reached out to customer service and they were so attentive. They helped me with my problem in a timely manner. Highly recommend to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Fonte

customer_reviews.title: Great clothes rack
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, sturdy, and can hold a very good amount. I love the two shelves on it. Worth every penny. This definitely seems like it is going to last a very long time. Price is very very fair
customer_reviews.author: Alya

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: For what this is, it's just fine. It's not super sturdy or large, but is pretty much as advertised and is attractive. I can hang a small number of items on it and it looks good in the room. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Mick

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and sturdy on carpet. Glad I found this before spending a fortune on a trendy site.
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, looks great and very pretty. Really affordable, but doesn't look cheap. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Miller

customer_reviews.title: Holes didn’t match up which made assembly tough
customer_reviews.text: The predrilled holes didn’t match up. I tried to redrill and that was a mistake. I should have just nailed the pieces together. Ultimately I got it together but it would have been much easier had they simply drilled the holes properly.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Seversen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price, super minimalist look, goes great with my room. Easy to put together. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Plants new home
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my space! Can’t wait to add more plants
customer_reviews.author: Bekie G

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: super cute, and really sturdy. I finally have extra storage in my closet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy, worth the money. The instructions were in Korean, but not particularly difficult to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Depew / Hei Hei Depew

customer_reviews.title: Great product highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it . I assembled it all by my dependent little self . & it fit my records on the bottom shelf ! The top bar might be a little wonky but idc, Just need some wood hangers now .
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece, Could Be More Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The wood on the crossbar splintered after a couple months and eventually broke. Fortunately, the seller was kind enough to send out a replacement. Very quick with their response so bumping up to 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Alycia Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose
customer_reviews.text: Currently using this as an anchor chart holder for my classroom. It was so easy to assemble and extremely sturdy. Might buy another for my home.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with all of tools to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Item came earlier than expected but it did not come with any screws. The instruction sheet listed out all the materials that were needed but the screws were not included in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece for price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for intended use in laundry room for hang drying clothes. Good quality for price.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and a Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Hesitated on purchasing this but I'm so glad I did.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful in our entryway to hang coats and the next day's outfits.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple...a bit smaller than expected but it works great

customer_reviews.title: More than just a clothing rack
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what I needed it for. Im using it to hang macrame pieces on to make them easier to work on. I am keeping my supplies on the shelves below.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive display for clothing
customer_reviews.text: This came in a small box! Easy to put together. Very nice. Decent quality.

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend put together for me as it is a bit involved. Took about 40 minutes. Looks great and just what I wanted. Well made.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my plants and it looks amazing and easy to assemble. I also have one for my bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a nice clothes rack if all the parts were delivered. Not the sturdiest but looks nice. Too bad I can’t fully set it up cause of missing parts.

product_meta.title: Finnhomy Bamboo Clothes Rack Portable Extra Large Garment Rack 2-Tire Storage Box Shelves For Entryway and Bed Room Patented Design
product_meta.description:
Instantly organize your messy items into neat condition with little effort 
-Easy Assembly 
-Large Space 
-Quality Made 
-Easy Access 

Package Dimension: 32.7 x 17.5 x 2.8 inches 

Package Weight: 11.35 lbs 

Approximate size: 60''H x 27 3/8''L x 16 3/4''W (152 x 69.5 x 42.5cm). 

Notes: Instruction and all parts are included, please contact us if anything missing.
feature_bullets: Sturdy & Durable Entryway Rack: this free standing coat rack, is crafted with High quality natural bamboo, strong and eco-friendly. We have strengthen the wood with steel in some parts, so the rack can hold more clothes, coats, handbag, cats. It's perfect choice to organize your entryway, bed room, or front door.

Less is more: We decide to offer a more efficient storage rack for entryway, so we canceled the wheel to improve the stability, and it's still portable. Also, we lengthened the main pole instead of the hooks, makes the rack looks more elegant and holds more.
Really Easy assembly: The parts need to assemble, is only half of previous products. We Pays more in transport for your connivances, but offer you this rack in great price.
Fashion & Simplicity Design: A shape - fashion and simplicity design - will be a spotlight in your hallway, entryway or balcony.
Approximate size: 60''H x 27 3/8''L x 16 3/4''W (152 x 69.5 x 42.5cm).
